system.description:
CELEBRITY

ALSO: EXECUTIVE, KINGPIN, INFLUENCER

Regardless of where you are from, popularity is key. This is where the Celebrity shines. They attract all sorts of diverse people that flock to them for their talent and skill. They travel the world sharing their ability, keeping all eyes on them. All the while, their fans build them up and propel their success far beyond any one talent could.

CELEBRITY FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points or Mind Points by 5 (your choice).

CELEBRITY SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.S7OuQTJZm9FkNFPf]{Call Entourage} (SL7)

Each time you take this Skill, you gain an Entourage Member. The rules for your Entourage Members and when and how you can use them can be found on the next page.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.HhvojZYtx4Gd2VoT]{Charming Presence} (SL3)

When you cast a spell that targets one or more allies, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you may have each of those allies recover up to 【SL, multiplied by the number of Bonds you have】 Mind Points. This recovery is separate from any caused by the effects of the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Aa1eUJd4Law4EZvU]{Cultural Phenomenon} (SL3)

After you rest in an area where you can reach a large number of people in person, or via technology or magic, you gain 【SL + 1】 Reputation Points. These represent your influence and social pull. You may never have more than 【SL + 3】 Reputation Points; if you acquire this Skill during character creation, begin play with 2 Reputation Points.

During a non-conflict scene, you may spend 2 Reputation Point when you meet an NPC to have them be a fan of yours, or otherwise be familiar enough with your work or position that they are positively or negatively (your choice) inclined to respect (or not) and work (or not) with you.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.JDyIbdohVYafVuTw]{Lethal Charisma}

You may use an action and spend 1 Reputation Point to perform an Opposed 【WLP + WLP】 Check against a nearby soldier-rank humanoid you can see. If you succeed, you gain control of the creature until the end of the scene (the Game Master gives you its profile).

You may only control one humanoid at any given time, but can free it whenever you choose; the controlled humanoid is also set free as soon as it is harmed by you or by one of your allies.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.4cZI8lvX0uriOM0g]{Low Profile} (SL3)

You can construct disguises that allow your identity to be hidden from those you interact with for short times. If an in person interaction extends longer than a minute, perform an Opposed 【INS + WLP + SL】 Check. If you win, you remain disguised. If they win, your identity is revealed.

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.No1TOlrk6C7apdTo]{Crowd Pleaser}
